read_directory=aligned_reads_SNScontrol_Tb427-2018-55_bowtie2               
# path to aligned reads

output_dir=StrandSpecific_shuffled_norrowPeaks_RNASE_Tb427-2018_p005
# output directory name (generated by the script in the working directory)

bam_file_prefix=aln-pe_TB_trimmed_unique_sorted_reheadered_dups-removed                 
# prefix of mapped reads ($sample$prefix.bam)

minus_peak_file_ending=_crick_bowtie2_trimmed_uniq_dupsre_narrow_p005_peaks.narrowPeak                
# file ending of minus peaks  ($sample$plus_peak_file_ending)

plus_peak_file_ending=_watson_bowtie2_trimmed_uniq_dupsre_narrow_p005_peaks.narrowPeak                
# file ending of plus peaks  ($sample$minus_peak_file_ending)

input_list=("shuffeled_9_vs_10-b" "shuffeled_11_vs_12-b" "shuffeled_13_vs_14-b" "shuffeled_15_vs_16-b" "shuffeled_17_vs_18-b" "shuffeled_19_vs_20-b")      
# sample name as found in bam files 

overlap_list=(50)                                                  
# peak overlap to be excluded

window_list=(500)                                       
# window size for peak pair selection
